TopicTitle: Were do I find this Parts?

Articles.Content:
I recently started with some 3.2x RSS and 5x RSS playing. And i'm looking for some parts, that I would like to have, to have more advanced and specialized technology. Do you know any mods which have those parts, or even a mod focused exactly on them?

- An Air-Augmented Rocket aka RamRocket

- a 2.5 m RAPIER (apart from the B9 SABRE)

- a Scramjet

- a 2.5 m Intake

- something like an electrical turbofan and bigger static solar panels to mount on wings. For high altutude gliders on Duna and Eve ( and someday a Titan-like GP2 moon)

bigger static solar panels to mount on wings. For high altutude gliders on Duna and Eve ( and someday a Titan-like GP2 moon)

does this count?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/83504-Solar-Panel-Wings
Or, you know, you could make them yourself? With the stock parts?

http://i.imgur.com/zGB362H.png

http://i.imgur.com/MaemOgB.png

Or, you know, you could make them yourself? With the stock parts?

Yes he could do that and make his PC fry itself or he could find a mod and only use 1 or 2 parts rather than 100 parts per engine.
Lack's SXT has a 2.5 meter jet engine and intake
